name: Skreech!
description:
Embrace or reject gravity with 2 exciting modes of 2D platforming!

Best with controllers. All modes use both control sticks!

Skreech is an ambassador to Earth from the Arachne system.

Fleeing Earth to notify their home about Earth’s nuclear catastrophe, Skreech’s ship is mysteriously shot and they crash land on an unknown planet.

At the start of the game, you’ll have to find a way to leave the planet and get back home.
